p: Coping with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), social distancing has been adopted as one of basic protective measures against severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2). Nonpharmaceutical interventions (NPIs) include actions to mitigate the spread of respiratory viruses: personal protective measures such as hand hygiene, cough etiquette, and voluntary home stay of ill persons; community measures such as school closures, social distancing in workplace, and avoidance of mass gathering. 1
